mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content,p.post_thumnail,p.user_id,p.category_id, c.category_id,c.category_title,c.user_id,co.comment_id,co.comment_content,co.user_id, co.created_at, u.user_id,u.nick_name FROM post p JOIN category c ON c.category_id = p.category_id INNER join comment co ON p.post_id = co.post_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = co.user_id WHERE p.post_id =#{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_content = #{commentContent} WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
